examples: Think you've dated everyone in this restaurant.
Creo que has salido con todo el mundo en este restaurante.
This restaurant means a lot to a lot of people.
Este restaurante significa mucho para mucha gente.
I mean, the restaurant is not closing down.
Quiero decir, el restaurante no cierra.
Turn a boat into a restaurant.
Convierte un barco en un restaurante.
